sources.title: Mesa of Lost Women
sources.description: A mad scientist named Aranya (Jackie Coogan) is creating giant spiders and dwarves in his lab on Zarpa Mesa in Mexico

sources.title: Mesa Of Lost Women
sources.description: Two people are found wandering across the Muerto Desert telling a tale of a mad scientist conducting horrible experiments involving humans and spiders. You can find out more about this film on its IMDB page A DivX copy of this movie can be found on the Archive here

sources.title: Mesa Of Lost Women (1953)
sources.description: Jackie Coogan, Mary Hill, Richard Travis,  Delores Fuller, Lyle Talbot, Tandra Quinn

sources.title: Mesa of Lost Women (1953)
sources.description: A mad scientist, Dr. Aranya (Jackie Coogan), has created giant spiders in his Mexican lab in Zarpa Mesa to create a race of superwomen by injecting spiders with human pituitary growth hormones. Women develop miraculous regenerative powers, but men mutate into disfigured dwarves. Spiders grow to human size and intelligence. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/mesa-of-lost-women-1953/

sources.title: Mesa of Lost Women (1953) HORROR
sources.description:
Stars: Jackie Coogan, Tandra Quinn, Richard Travis
Directors: Ron Ormond, Herbert Tevos

At his remote laboratory in Zarpa Mesa in Mexico, a mad scientist seeks to create a master race of superwomen by injecting his subjects with spider venom! A FIVE ANCHOVY PIZZAFLIX!

sources.title: Mesa of Lost Women (1953) Horror, Sci-Fi, Cult FIlm
sources.description:
A race of deadly spider-women luring men to their death!
A mad scientist named Arana is creating giant spiders and dwarfs in his lab on Zarpa Mesa in Mexico. He wants to create a master race of superwomen by injecting his female subjects with spider venom.

Directors: Ron Ormond, Herbert Tevos
Writer: Herbert Tevos 
Stars: Jackie Coogan, Allan Nixon, Richard Travis 
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, B movie, Horror, Sci-Fi
